chunks.text:
Kindly note that we will be having a popup at DFC Marsa Blvd with the following information : 

 

Installation Date & Time : 21st March 25 – 4am – 4pm

Store Code & BU Code : 30045 / CC_10SW8

Operating Date & Time: 21 March – 6 April 

	*	Ramadan: 6PM – 2AM
	*	Eid: 4PM – 1AM

1.	@Mahmoud Abd Hamid <mailto:Mahmoud.Khedr@chalhoub.com>  @Government Affairs <mailto:Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com>  to secure the DET Permit and share the same.
2.	@Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  : To arrange two credit card machines for the Pop Up, Payment Methods No Cash, only CC, Tabby & Tamara ( They will use DFC boutique accounts for Tabby/Tamara)
3.	@Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com> CCTV : Needs to be installed (Equipment already available from the last project)
4.	@Joseph Diaz <mailto:Joseph.Diaz@chalhoub.com>  @DL-WPT-UAE-Retail <mailto:DL-WPT-UAE-Retail@chalhoub.com>  IT : POS, Zebra HHT & Internet connectivity.
5.	@Imran Meher <mailto:Imran.Meher@chalhoub.com>  @Mohammed Meraj <mailto:Mohammed.Khan@chalhoub.com>  : to arrange the product ranging pricing and shipment to the Pop Up.
6.	@Omar Alaridi <mailto:Omar.Alaridi@chalhoub.com>  : to confirm if we need security guard and confirm the date and time needed for the security.
7.	@Omar Alaridi <mailto:Omar.Alaridi@chalhoub.com>  : to arrange the required supplies for the Pop Up prior the opening and order the needed POS invoices/Materials.
8.	@Omar Alaridi <mailto:Omar.Alaridi@chalhoub.com>  : to make sure a proper receiving of stock prior the opening of the Pop Up and clearing out the SOH upon closure.

chunks.text:
@Omar Alaridi <mailto:Omar.Alaridi@chalhoub.com>  : to make sure a proper receiving of stock prior the opening of the Pop Up and clearing out the SOH upon closure.
9.	@Omar Alaridi <mailto:Omar.Alaridi@chalhoub.com>  : to log the IT service request (Xstore & SIOCS) for the required cahiers during the Pop Up 
10.	@Marine Fabbricino <mailto:Marine.Fabbricino@chalhoub.com>  @Amaya Miranda <mailto:Amaya.Miranda@chalhoub.com>  to share the google map location with all stakeholders. 
11.	@Real Emirates Shop Reconciliations <mailto:Realemirates.shopreconciliations@chalhoub.com>  @Retail Accounting <mailto:RetailAccounting@chalhoub.com>  @Accounting Retailcollection <mailto:accounting.retailcollection@chalhoub.com>  to note the above activity for the sales reconciliation,
12.	@Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  : to validate if the insurance certificate is required.

 

The layout is the same one we used for Ariana Grande at MOE,

 



 

 

Best Regards,

 

MUHAMMED SWEADAN​​​​

MANAGER ‑ RSO

Cc: Benedicte Blanc <Benedicte.Blanc@chalhoub.com>
Subject: Swarovski X Marsa Blvd - DFC PopUp - Opening

 

Dear All,

 

Hope all is well !

 

Kindly note that we will be having a popup at DFC Marsa Blvd with the following information : 

 

Installation Date & Time : 21st March 25 – 4am – 4pm

Store Code & BU Code : 30045 / CC_10SW8

Operating Date & Time: 21 March – 6 April 

	*	Ramadan: 6PM – 2AM
	*	Eid: 4PM – 1AM

1.	@Mahmoud Abd Hamid <mailto:Mahmoud.Khedr@chalhoub.com>  @Government Affairs <mailto:Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com>  to secure the DET Permit and share the same.
2.	@Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  : To arrange two credit card machines for the Pop Up, Payment Methods No Cash, only CC, Tabby & Tamara ( They will use DFC boutique accounts for Tabby/Tamara)
3.	@Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com> CCTV : Needs to be installed (Equipment already available from the last project)
4.	@Joseph Diaz <mailto:Joseph.Diaz@chalhoub.com>  @DL-WPT-UAE-Retail <mailto:DL-WPT-UAE-Retail@chalhoub.com>  IT : POS, Zebra HHT & Internet connectivity.
5.	@Imran Meher <mailto:Imran.Meher@chalhoub.com>  @Mohammed Meraj <mailto:Mohammed.Khan@chalhoub.com>  : to arrange the product ranging pricing and shipment to the Pop Up.
6.	@Omar Alaridi <mailto:Omar.Alaridi@chalhoub.com>  : to confirm if we need security guard and confirm the date and time needed for the security.
7.	@Omar Alaridi <mailto:Omar.Alaridi@chalhoub.com>  : to arrange the required supplies for the Pop Up prior the opening and order the needed POS invoices/Materials.

9.	@Omar Alaridi <mailto:Omar.Alaridi@chalhoub.com>  : to log the IT service request (Xstore & SIOCS) for the required cahiers during the Pop Up 
10.	@Marine Fabbricino <mailto:Marine.Fabbricino@chalhoub.com>  @Amaya Miranda <mailto:Amaya.Miranda@chalhoub.com>  to share the google map location with all stakeholders. 
11.	@Real Emirates Shop Reconciliations <mailto:Realemirates.shopreconciliations@chalhoub.com>  @Retail Accounting <mailto:RetailAccounting@chalhoub.com>  @Accounting Retailcollection <mailto:accounting.retailcollection@chalhoub.com>  to note the above activity for the sales reconciliation,
12.	@Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  : to validate if the insurance certificate is required.

 

The layout is the same one we used for Ariana Grande at MOE,

 



 

 

Best Regards,
